original_title: Kowai Douga Noroi no Toshi Densetsu & Shinrei Toukou Zenshuu
overview: The original horror production by Million Publishing. For ominous reasons, the spiritism videos in this collection survived the purification ceremony, making them an incredible rarity to be treasured. Additionally, Takehiko Koike and Kaoss Sumikura follow up on psychic recordings regarding urban legends.
title: Kowai Douga Noroi no Toshi Densetsu & Shinrei Toukou Zenshuu
